fields.name: abilities:
fields.value:
- ???
attributes:
- at the start of the game, the host will secretly make a role that fits the alignment of town support. you will be told how to target, but not what your ability does.
- each day, you may guess what your ability does, and the host will tell you how close your guess is on a scale of 1-10 (1 = completely off, 10 = that's the ability).
- __**part of the daily streak faction**__
goal:
kill all who oppose town.
